issue.title: Pelvis vs Foot Orientation after teleport

content.raw:
Ah so I think you didn't see the issue on the other tasks because they happened to be aligned with the world. But don't count on this, because during the finals, they will probably have different orientations on each world.

After teleporting, the pelvis orientation on `/ihmc_ros/valkyrie/output/robot_pose` is updated with the new orientation in the world frame. According to what you're saying, the feet orientation are not updated.

I recommend you read through issue #142. I believe the conclusions from that issue were:

* after teleporting, you should not rely on the translation from `/ihmc_ros/valkyrie/output/robot_pose`
* but you can rely on the orientation
* When sending step commands, give an offset with respect to the current foot pose (not the absolute pose)
